idea:
Greenitco Technologies is fast making a mark in fields such as Asset management solutions and Mobile Application services.

Greenitco Technologies has gained industry recognition for its incomparable product, ITM, a cloud-based asset management software. The innovative Milk Calendar Mobile App is an Lost and Found Networks app which help users to report any lost and found item. Greenitco helps organizations in implementation ISO 27001, asset tagging, asset compliance, and enterprise ticketing solution, it makes Greenitco Technologies a one-stop shop for almost any internet or tech requirement.

In the field of IT asset management, ITM indicates that this technology can save up to a million dollars. Asset tracking helps technical administrators make critical decisions, identify and remove bottlenecks, and reduce costs. The IT inventory tool is backed by over 15 years of experience in fields such as security, counterfeiting technologies and infrastructure, which help integrate IT departments within their organizations. Quality assurance is guaranteed, and the company enjoys a partnership with CWS and as Dell OEM.

As a user case of a travel industry player indicates, ITM assisted it in managing over 5,000 assets and improved service delivery and reporting services. The outcome was a simple yet strong interface, and reduction in costs of unused licenses.

Greenitco has been awarded the “Best Software Development Company 2018 - India & Innovation Award in Asset Management Software – India” by the CV Magazine, and the “TOP Enterprise Asset Management Software” by CIO Review.
name: GREENITCO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
